name: GLMap
summary: Framework for rendering your own vector maps using a unique style with OpenGL
description:
The GLMap framework has been built to allow you to easily integrate an offline map into any iOS or Android application.

Features:
* Map rendering is performed directly on GPU
* MapCSS-based rules allows map to be rendered with different styles
* Custom GeoJSON data could be added on map using MapCSS
* Online and offline vector map mode support
* Raster map source could be displayed
